name: Capo (fezes, Baliza)
description:
Controls:

 • [Space] to start  •

•  [W] [A] [S] [D] to walk  •

•  [LMB] to shoot  •

•  [Space] to switch element  •

•  [Esc] to exit  •

If nothing is spawning, restart the game

Rules:

 There are four elemental powers to acquire and recharge, each of which deals additional damage to the one that's weak to it:

Default state deals same small amount of damage to every enemy type, and an attack from the same element deals no damage at all.

Made for LOWREZJAM 2022
